import React, { useContext } from "react"; import ApplyCoupon from "./ApplyCoupon"; import CartCheckOutButton from "./CartCheckOutButton"; import CartRow from "./CartRow"; import CartContext from "../context/cart/CartContext"; import Formatter from "../Formatter"; import EmptyCart from "./EmptyCart"; const Cart = () => { const cartContext = useContext(CartContext); const { cart, shippingCharge, couponValue } = cartContext; //Get the total cost in carty const totalCost = cart?.length > 0 && cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce((prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0) //Get percentage amount to be deducted const couponWorth = cart?.length > 0 && cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce((prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0) * (couponValue / 100) //Cost after deducting coupon value if any const totalCostAfterCoupon = (totalCost && couponWorth) && totalCost - couponWorth //Total amount to pay const totalAmountToPay = (totalCostAfterCoupon && shippingCharge) && totalCostAfterCoupon-shippingCharge return (
{cart.length < 1 ? ( ) : (
{cart.length > 0 && cart.map((item) => { return ; })}
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price

Order Details

Subtotal
{totalCost && Formatter.format( totalCost )}
Coupon
{couponValue ? `${couponValue}%` : "-"}
New Subtotal
{/* substract coupon value here */} {totalCost && Formatter.format( totalCost - couponWorth )}
Shipping Charge
{shippingCharge ? Formatter.format(shippingCharge) : "-"}
Total
{(totalCost && couponWorth && shippingCharge) && Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) * (couponValue / 100) + shippingCharge )}
)}
); }; export default Cart;
